message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $17000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think it's worth a bit more than $17000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $19000. What do you think?
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to pay, but $19000 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $18000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob! I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $18500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $18500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $17500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $17750. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17750 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $17000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $17200. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
